title: Sur les Bords du Saint-Laurent
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Elle a tort Jacinthe de se pencher comme ca' by Odette Joyeux.
description: Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”. Today is the day for Jacinthe and Bicou to present for their dance exam. Jacinthe gives her precious ring to Bicou's father for tightening. He is quick to realise that the ring is not a prop but a high quality diamond.  Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain. Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.
related_objects: Series; S002034; Le Tresor des Hollandais; Active; 1969
